rules.natural: Provided that the seismometer detects the earthquake, then the disaster prevents casualties.
Either the seismometer detects the earthquake or the team activates the evacuation protocol.
If the satellite monitors weather patterns, the disaster prevents casualties.
Whenever the meteorology department issues a warning, it follows that the disaster prevents casualties.
Under the condition that the sensor detects a temperature rise, the satellite monitors weather patterns.
If the technician observes a pressure change, the meteorology department issues a warning.
The lab confirms contamination, or the sensor detects a temperature rise, or the technician observes a pressure change.
Should the inspector verify safety, then the lab does not confirm contamination.
The NGO mobilizing volunteers implies that the response team deploys supplies, or, if the team activates the evacuation protocol, the disaster prevents casualties.
In case the charity organizes a donation drive, then either the response team deploys supplies or, given that the team activates the evacuation protocol, the disaster prevents casualties.
The Red Cross activates the emergency plan or FEMA implements the response protocol.
Under the condition that FEMA implements the response protocol, the NGO mobilizes volunteers or the charity organizes a donation drive.
If the official declares a state of emergency, the authority evacuates residents.
Should the agency notify the public, then, if the municipality restricts travel, the administration closes schools.
The agency notifies the public or the media broadcasts alerts.
In case the media broadcasts alerts, then, whenever the municipality restricts travel, the administration closes schools.
Under the condition that the specialist inspects infrastructure, the government does not authorize funding.
If the council rejects the proposal, the committee does not approve the budget.

rules.prover9_expression: (completes(crew, repairs) | (-(assesses(engineer, damage) -> inspects(specialist, infrastructure)) -> rejects(council, proposal)))
rules.natural: The crew completes repairs, or, if it is not the case that the engineer assessing damage implies the specialist inspects infrastructure, then the council rejects the proposal.
The command center dispatches the team or headquarters establishes communication.
Under the condition that headquarters establishes communication, then, if the team activates the evacuation protocol, the disaster prevents casualties.
Should the coordinator assign tasks, the response team deploys supplies.
If the report contradicts the findings, the analysis confirms the data.
Provided that the report contradicts the findings, the expert disputes the conclusion.
Under the condition that the expert disputes the conclusion, the analysis does not confirm the data.
Whenever the contractor halts work, the government does not authorize funding.
If the director initiates the investigation, then, should the agency cancel the relief mission, the contractor halts work.
The director initiates the investigation or the commission launches an inquiry.
Under the condition that the aid center requests volunteers, the response team deploys supplies.
The aid center requests volunteers or emergency operations coordinate shelters.
Should the board accept the recommendation, the panel does not resolve the dispute.

rules.prover9_expression: (concludes(team, review) | (-(endorses(committee, report) -> accepts(board, recommendation)) -> dismisses(chair, complaint)))
rules.natural: The team concludes the review, or, in case the committee endorsing the report does not imply the board accepts the recommendation, then the chair dismisses the complaint.
Under the condition that the agency cancels the relief mission, the engineer assesses damage.
Whenever the agency cancels the relief mission, the government authorizes funding.
Under the condition that the organization suspends operations, then, should the agency cancel the relief mission, the government does not authorize funding.
The organization suspends operations or resources are diverted elsewhere.
If resources are diverted elsewhere, then, provided that the agency cancels the relief mission, the government does not authorize funding.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(activates(red_cross, emergency_plan) -> (mobilizes(ngo, volunteers) | organizes(charity, donation_drive))) -> declares(official, state_of_emergency))
rules.natural: In case it is not true that the Red Cross activating the emergency plan implies the NGO mobilizes volunteers or the charity organizes a donation drive, then the official declares a state of emergency.
Under the condition that the team activating the evacuation protocol does not imply the disaster prevents casualties, the municipality restricts travel.
Should the team activating the evacuation protocol not imply the disaster prevents casualties, the administration does not close schools.
If it is not true that the engineer assessing damage implies the specialist inspects infrastructure, the committee approves the budget.
In case the command center dispatching the team does not imply the coordinator assigns tasks, the report contradicts the findings.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(launches(commission, inquiry) -> (cancels(agency, relief_mission) -> halts(contractor, work))) -> resolves(panel, dispute))
rules.natural: Should it not be true that the commission launching an inquiry implies that, if the agency cancels the relief mission, the contractor halts work, then the panel resolves the dispute.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(launches(commission, inquiry) -> (cancels(agency, relief_mission) -> halts(contractor, work))) -> endorses(committee, report))
rules.natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that the commission launching an inquiry implies that, should the agency cancel the relief mission, the contractor halts work, the committee endorses the report.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(coordinates(emergency_ops, shelters) -> (activates(team, evacuation_protocol) -> prevents(disaster, casualties))) -> cancels(agency, relief_mission))
rules.natural: Provided that it is not the case that emergency operations coordinating shelters implies that, if the team activates the evacuation protocol, the disaster prevents casualties, the agency cancels the relief mission.

facts.natural: The authority does not evacuate residents.
The response team does not deploy supplies.
The crew does not complete repairs.
The chair does not dismiss the complaint.
The team does not conclude the review.

(A1 → G).natural: Provided that the seismometer detects the earthquake, then the disaster prevents casualties.

(A1 ∨ A2).natural: Either the seismometer detects the earthquake or the team activates the evacuation protocol.

(A10 → G).natural: If the satellite monitors weather patterns, the disaster prevents casualties.

(A10 ∨ A11).natural: The satellite monitors weather patterns or the meteorology department issues a warning.

(A11 → G).natural: Whenever the meteorology department issues a warning, it follows that the disaster prevents casualties.

(A12 → A10).natural: Under the condition that the sensor detects a temperature rise, the satellite monitors weather patterns.

(A12 ∨ A13).natural: The sensor detects a temperature rise or the technician observes a pressure change.

(A13 → A11).natural: If the technician observes a pressure change, the meteorology department issues a warning.

(A14 ∨ (A12 ∨ A13)).natural: The lab confirms contamination, or the sensor detects a temperature rise, or the technician observes a pressure change.

(A15 → ¬A14).natural: Should the inspector verify safety, then the lab does not confirm contamination.

(A16 → (A3 ∨ (A2 → G))).natural: The NGO mobilizing volunteers implies that the response team deploys supplies, or, if the team activates the evacuation protocol, the disaster prevents casualties.

(A16 ∨ A17).natural: The NGO mobilizes volunteers or the charity organizes a donation drive.

(A17 → (A3 ∨ (A2 → G))).natural: In case the charity organizes a donation drive, then either the response team deploys supplies or, given that the team activates the evacuation protocol, the disaster prevents casualties.

(A18 → (A16 ∨ A17)).natural: Provided that the Red Cross activates the emergency plan, then the NGO mobilizes volunteers or the charity organizes a donation drive.

(A18 ∨ A19).natural: The Red Cross activates the emergency plan or FEMA implements the response protocol.

(A19 → (A16 ∨ A17)).natural: Under the condition that FEMA implements the response protocol, the NGO mobilizes volunteers or the charity organizes a donation drive.

(A2 → G).natural: Whenever the team activates the evacuation protocol, the disaster prevents casualties.

(A20 → A21).natural: If the official declares a state of emergency, the authority evacuates residents.

(A23 → A22).natural: Provided that the municipality restricts travel, the administration closes schools.

(A24 → (A23 → A22)).natural: Should the agency notify the public, then, if the municipality restricts travel, the administration closes schools.

(A24 ∨ A25).natural: The agency notifies the public or the media broadcasts alerts.

(A25 → (A23 → A22)).natural: In case the media broadcasts alerts, then, whenever the municipality restricts travel, the administration closes schools.

(A26 → A27).natural: If the engineer assesses damage, the specialist inspects infrastructure.

(A26 → ¬A7).natural: Provided that the engineer assesses damage, the government does not authorize funding.

(A27 → ¬A7).natural: Under the condition that the specialist inspects infrastructure, the government does not authorize funding.

(A29 → ¬A28).natural: If the council rejects the proposal, the committee does not approve the budget.

(A3 ∨ (A2 → G)).natural: The response team deploys supplies or, should the team activate the evacuation protocol, the disaster prevents casualties.

(A30 ∨ (¬(A26 → A27) → A29)).prover9_expression: (completes(crew, repairs) | (-(assesses(engineer, damage) -> inspects(specialist, infrastructure)) -> rejects(council, proposal)))
(A30 ∨ (¬(A26 → A27) → A29)).natural: The crew completes repairs, or, if it is not the case that the engineer assessing damage implies the specialist inspects infrastructure, then the council rejects the proposal.

(A31 → A3).natural: Whenever the command center dispatches the team, the response team deploys supplies.

(A31 → A33).natural: Provided that the command center dispatches the team, the coordinator assigns tasks.

(A31 ∨ A32).natural: The command center dispatches the team or headquarters establishes communication.

(A32 → (A2 → G)).natural: Under the condition that headquarters establishes communication, then, if the team activates the evacuation protocol, the disaster prevents casualties.

(A33 → A3).natural: Should the coordinator assign tasks, the response team deploys supplies.

(A34 → A35).natural: If the report contradicts the findings, the analysis confirms the data.

(A34 → A36).natural: Provided that the report contradicts the findings, the expert disputes the conclusion.

(A36 → ¬A35).natural: Under the condition that the expert disputes the conclusion, the analysis does not confirm the data.

(A38 ∨ A39).natural: The director initiates the investigation or the commission launches an inquiry.
